website_summaries.verdict: Vitamin E and alpha hydroxyl acid helps nourish skin as it tans.
pros: It goes on silky, dries quickly, and doesn't streak, developing just the right amount of color
Customers also prefer the gelee to the lotion variety from the brand
cons: A few users found it dried a little too quickly, before they could smooth it out, but results remained good

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of color
customer_reviews.text: I only use this to color my legs spring, summer & fall so I can wear shorts & skorts. It gives just the right amount of color. That said, I wouldn't wear white. It can stain the leg edge of clothes where it rubs.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Obtain a nice tan without the sun or tanning bed
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 2 or 3 years. I really like it. Hasn't streaked and has a pleasant smell. Subline has a bronze one but I don't like glitter all over me. This is a great way to get a nice color without thr danger of the sun or tanning beds. Just remember, use small amounts to small areas at a time. Wash your hands right after applying. I apply after I shower and even apply over body lotion. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous .....as it tightens your skin as well
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! Not because of its tanning properties (which is excellent also), but because when I use it on my face, it tightens the skin and makes me look 10 years younger. If I have a big event and I want to look refreshed, I put it on in the morning, leave it for half hour and then apply my makeup. In a few hours, I see a more pulled together firmer face. Lasts for a couple of days. I was going to let L'Oreal know what a gem they have as they probably don't know about it. Wonder what the ingredient is that makes it so.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood insider

customer_reviews.title: Been using this product for years and I love it! Have never had a bad reaction as ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years and I love it! Have never had a bad reaction as some folks do with different face products.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Leseman

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This tanning gel requires several applications to accomplish much coloring at all. It also requires about 3 or 4 hours to develop any coloring. Since it is a translucent gel, it's difficult to see if you've put it on evenly. I wasn't overly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanner. Goes on easily and does last several days. Be sure to exfoliate before using and air dry for a few minutes before dressing. Has a great bronze color. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning product ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tanning product I have ever used. I can no longer find this in stores and think it may be discontinued which is a shame. I use it on my face, under makeup and it looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Huckins

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm.. Ok
customer_reviews.text: I thought the L'Oreal gel was okay. I was not as impressed with the product as other reviewers. It doesn't streak and the smell is pleasant. I thought I would get a tanner look within 24 hours, however, I did not notice anything until day 2. I typically use Banana Boat self tanner and I think it is very effective.. Maybe 4-5 hours and I saw a tanner look. Unfortunately, it does not smell as good as L'Oreal
customer_reviews.author: KEITH HUTCHISON

customer_reviews.title: Sunless Tanning Gel
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 5 yrs. and love it. NEVER STREAKS!! NATURAL COLOR
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Looks like a natural tan. Dries quickly. Smell is not offensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best and most natural tan!
customer_reviews.text: Natural and healthy! Recommend applying at night and in morning have great glow without having to apply foundation or tinted moisturizer! Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burbank

customer_reviews.title: This product makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: All likes - Easy to put on with no streaking. Moisturizes your skin, as well. After it's dry, it won't rub off on clothing, towels or sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bollig

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product just make sure you follow instructions and wash your hands after use Does not look fake
customer_reviews.author: marie milano

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt turn skin orange
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spread and it did not turn my skin orange. Looks natural .
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Use gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Been doing thus for years. This one is the best. Best color and fast drying.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Loverock

customer_reviews.title: No streaks
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use no streaks and leaves a nice color
customer_reviews.author: Erin Yokaitis

customer_reviews.title: good application
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't streak and gives me good color on just one application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best sunless tanning on the market
customer_reviews.text: Love it It is so easy to use and it dries so fast. It does not come off on your clothes
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: I used this product for the first time yesterday - it does dry quickly - no harsh odor - and went on evenly and easily - but good golly my poor legs are a ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely if ever take the time to write a review, but I felt compelled to be totally honest on this purchase. I used this product for the first time yesterday - it does dry quickly - no harsh odor - and went on evenly and easily - but good golly my poor legs are a pathetic shade of rust/orange. I used very little as I was not used to the gel and like a lighter shade of tan. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn A. Matzke

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, Hubby says It has a little orange tint look.
customer_reviews.author: Shilo

customer_reviews.title: Did not care for this product. After cleansing, ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for this product. After cleansing, exfoliating prior to use, I still had funky color on knees, ankles and heels. Not a natural color. I will not be applying this on my skin again. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Most pleasant of all drug store brands
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to use a fake tanner with all of its chemicals, you may as well use a good one. I’ve tried every drugstore brand and this is easily my favorite. Goes on easily, nice even coverage, very little scent, lasts for days and then fades away gradually. I prefer the “Deep” version but that’s hard to find online. One coat of this on pale skin takes away the glare and two makes you look like you spent a weekend at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good color lasts
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite product that I have tried for extremely pale legs. The color lasts longer and looks more natural than my previous tries. The major downside is how sticky it leaves me feeling. But I usually put it on before I go to sleep and shower in the morning, shave and repeat as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Churst

customer_reviews.title: This gel is pretty swell!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite self tanner & I can only find it here on Amazon! -Helps prevent acne (why should that be allowed in adults?!) -Evens my skin tone -Goes on smoothly & evenly -I use less foundation -Smells lovely & doesn’t dye my hands -I receive many compliments & always refer people to this product, BUY IT! I didn’t receive anything for my review, I seriously love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have tried at least a half dozen brands and this Gelee is the best I have found... mild smell, goes on smoothly, no streaking, long-lasting, no allergic reaction, a little goes a long way. I only use it on my face and am very satisfied. It will be the only one I use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Big-Z

customer_reviews.title: Nice tan look and pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product which I've been using fir years. As far as age spots, I use a cotton swab dipped in hydrogen peroxide to dab on age spots to avoid then lookinh darker.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It has a light, pleasant scent and it develops into natural looking color. The best part is the lovely texture. Amazing price for such a luxurious product
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Tube was open when delivered
customer_reviews.text: Tube was open when I received it and the outside of the tube AND the packaging of my other project was a greasy mess.
customer_reviews.author: GolferGirlTN

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and subtle color change - more than the lotion types but not spray tan ugly. Did not streak but does have a smell that some might not like.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: good but can cause itchiness and redness
customer_reviews.text: i liked the color on this i did get one streak and some uneven patches on my lower legs. however my biggest issue was insane redness and itchiness on my thighs, chest, and back. so bad i left bruises from scratching. had to run to the store and get benedryl and cortisone. only sleep made it better. however as far as i can tell the tan survived the scratching (started 3 hours in). i use gloves and use a wide paiting brush to diffuse the product near risks, joints, knees, etc, so blending works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Q. M. of CA

product_meta.title: L'Oreal SUBLIME BRONZE Self-Tanning Gelee Medium-Natural 5 oz
feature_bullets: Ultra-lightweight sunless tanning gelee applies easily and dries quickly for a streak-free, natural-looking tan
Formulated with Vitamin e and AHA for added hydration, this moisturizing self-tanning gelee leaves skin smooth and soft
Apply 1-2 times a week to maintain your sun-kissed glow right at home
